title: [K-12] Design and Analysis of Learner Interactions Based on LMS: Application to Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital competencies and foundational knowledge in elementary education
context.additional_context: Enhancing Learning Design Capabilities Using LMS for Corporate Elementary Education Coordinators

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interaction patterns using learning analytics data in a Learning Management System (LMS)
Learners can design learning modules by applying the Coordination and Comparison principles of the LAI framework
Learners can predict learning outcomes based on engagement metrics (page views, discussion post length, etc.) in mobile environments
Learners can implement LMS learning designs tailored to real-world corporate training scenarios through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
